SDG_TARGET:
11.6

By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management
SDG_INDICATOR:
11.6.1

Proportion of urban solid waste regularly collected and with adequate final discharge out of total urban solid waste generated, by cities
STAT_CONC_DEF: Proportion solid waste regularly collected from households out of total solid waste generated.
COMPARABILITY:
Indicator available

Distribution (%) of households by main mode of waste management, according to urban/rural, province and sex of head of household

Main mode of rubbish disposal (waste management)

- Rubbish collection service
